{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Cornhole {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Cornhole Cornhole (also known regionally as bags , sack toss , or bean bag toss ) is a lawn game in which players take turns throwing 16 ounce bags of corn kernels at a raised platform (board) with a hole in the far end. A bag in the hole scores 3 points, while one on the board scores 1 point. Play continues until a team or player reaches or exceeds the score of 21 by means of cancellation scoring. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cornhole)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
